SECTION_CONTENT:
Contact supplier if guidance is required. Do not discharge into any place where its
accumulation could be dangerous. Ensure that the emission levels from local regulations or
operating permits are not exceeded. Waste gas should be flared through a suitable burner with
flash back arrestor. Do not discharge into areas where there is a risk of forming an explosive
mixture with air.
Refer to the CGA Pamphlet P-63 "Disposal of Gases" available at www.cganet.com for
more guidance on suitable disposal methods.
16 05 04 *: Gases in pressure containers (including halons) containing hazardous substances.
